resources.string: Are you sure you want to reset Wi-Fi settings for "%1$s"?
Don\'t turn off cycle when lamp is off

Enter these commands in the text field and click SEND.

SYSTEM:
TXT-reset=wifi
— Reset Wi-Fi settings (Creates Access Point).

TXT-reset=effects
— Reset all effects to defaults.

TXT-esp_mode=1
— Switch to Router Mode (Client).

TXT-esp_mode=0
— Switch to Access Point Mode.

RANDOMIZER:
TXT-random=on
— Enable random settings in Cycle.

TXT-random=off
— Disable randomizer.

FIRST CONNECTION:
1. Turn on the lamp.
2. Connect to Wi-Fi LedLamp1 (password: 12345678).
3. The settings window will open (or enter address 192.168.4.1 in your browser).
4. Enter your router name and password.
5. The lamp will reboot into client mode and connect to your network.
6. In the \"Connection\" menu, search for lamps. After the lamp IP address appears, give it a name and click \"Add Lamp\".

OPERATING MODES:
1. Access Point (AP): The lamp creates its own network. No Internet.
2. Client (WLAN): The lamp is connected to the router. Main mode.

If the lamp cannot connect to the router, it will create an Access Point again.

SECTION 2. APP USAGE

MAIN SCREEN:
• Lamp Selection: Allows selecting the required lamp if there are several.
• Lamp: Turns the lamp ON/OFF and shows current status.
• Cycle: Enables automatic effect switching. Settings for interval and effect list are in the "Cycle Mode" menu.
• Effects List: Allows selecting an effect from the list.
• Sliders:
— Brightness: Brightness of the current effect.
— Speed: Animation speed of the effect.
— Scale / Color: For some effects changes element size, for others selects color (shown as a gradient).
• Reset: Resets current effect settings to default.

SAVING SETTINGS:
The app automatically remembers the last selected effect. The lamp remembers speed and brightness settings for each effect individually.

--------------------------------

SETTINGS MENU

1. CONNECTION
Search for lamps in the network, add new lamps by IP, edit saved lamps list.

2. APP SETTINGS
Vibration control, slider style selection, lamp time settings. The lamp gets time from the Internet. If no Internet, time can be set via text command or "Sync Time" button. If lamp time differs from phone time, re-sync will adjust the offset. Internet sync always has priority.

3. EFFECTS MANAGER
Sort effect list (drag up/down) and disable unwanted effects from the main screen.

4. CYCLE MODE
Select effects to play in automatic mode and set switching interval.

5. DAWN ALARM
Setup time and weekdays for smooth sunrise simulation before waking up.

6. SLEEP TIMER
Set countdown for automatic lamp turn-off.

7. PAINTING
Draw with pixels on the matrix in real-time. Tools: pencil, eraser, color picker, brush brightness. The drawing will be saved in the "Drawing" effect.

8. RUNNING TEXT
Send text for "Running Text" effect. Also used for service commands.

9. POWER SCHEDULE
Flexible ON/OFF schedule by weekdays (up to 5 events per day). Allows turning on one day and turning off on another.

10. LANGUAGE
Change app interface language (Ukrainian, English, Dansk).

BUTTON CONTROL:

The lamp can be controlled using the touch button located on the top of the lamp. When pressed, the button lights up red.

• 1 click — Turn ON / OFF.
• 2 clicks — Next effect.
• 3 clicks — Previous effect.
• 4 clicks — OTA Firmware update mode (for developers).
• 5 clicks — Show IP address (running text).
• 6 clicks — Show current time.
• 7 clicks — Switch Wi-Fi mode (Access Point <-> Client).

HOLD ACTIONS:

• Hold — Adjust Brightness.
• 1 click + Hold — Adjust Speed.
• 2 clicks + Hold — Adjust Scale.

Note: Each subsequent hold changes the adjustment direction (increase/decrease).

MULTIPLE PHONES:
You can control the lamp from different phones.

SYNCHRONIZATION:
• "Cycle" List: Stored in the lamp. Shared for all. The list in the lamp updates upon the last change on any phone.
• Effect display order on main screen: Stored in the phone. Individual for everyone.

MULTIPLE LAMPS:
Add their IP addresses in the "Connection" menu and switch between them on the main screen. All commands are sent only to the lamp selected on the main screen.
Set wake-up time (max brightness). The effect will start earlier depending on duration.
